author: Julian Baker
title: NRW.Bank names leads for 3yr USD Reg S floater
text:
LONDON, Feb 26 (IFR) - NRW.BANK, the explicitly guaranteed development agency of the GERMAN FEDERAL STATE OF NORTH RHINE-WESTPHALIA (NRW), rated Aa1/AA-/AAA/AA+ (all stable) by Moodyâ€˜s/S&P/Fitch/Dagong, has mandated BARCLAYS, JP Morgan, TD Securities and RBC Capital Markets to lead manage its upcoming 3-year USD FRN Reg S transaction.
Launch is expected in the near future, subject to market conditions.
Manufacturer target market (MiFID II product governance) is eligible counterparties, professional, and retail (all distribution channels). FCA/ICMA stabilisation.
